channel.title: Concertos of Chaos
channel.description: A Deaf Pianist Orchestrates Raw Mental Health Conversations Uncensored, Unedited, Unapologetic

item.title: 00_Pilot_Episode
item.description: This pilot episode is meant to give a feel of my show. Bear with me as this first episode has all the mistakes in it like popping, clicking, and smacking of my mouth. :-) Gotta learn to walk before we can run! I hope you enjoy this episode!
